00023 package org.bn;
00024 
00113 import org.bn.coders.BERDecoder;
00114 import org.bn.coders.BEREncoder;
00115 import org.bn.coders.DERDecoder;
00116 import org.bn.coders.DEREncoder;
00117 import org.bn.coders.PERAlignedDecoder;
00118 import org.bn.coders.PERAlignedEncoder;
00119 import org.bn.coders.PERUnalignedDecoder;
00120 import org.bn.coders.PERUnalignedEncoder;
00121 
00125 public class CoderFactory {
00126     private static CoderFactory instance = new CoderFactory();
00127     
00132     public static CoderFactory getInstance() {
00133         return instance;
00134     }
00135 
00140     public <T> IEncoder<T> newEncoder() throws Exception {
00141         return newEncoder("BER");
00142     }
00143 
00150     public <T> IEncoder<T> newEncoder(String encodingSchema) throws Exception {
00151         if(encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("BER")) {
00152             return new BEREncoder<T>();
00153         }
00154         else
00155         if(encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER")||encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER/Aligned")||encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER/A")) {
00156             return new PERAlignedEncoder<T>();
00157         }        
00158         else
00159         if(encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER/Unaligned")||encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER/U")) {
00160             return new PERUnalignedEncoder<T>();
00161         }        
00162         else        
00163         if(encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("DER")) {
00164             return new DEREncoder<T>();
00165         }        
00166         else                
00167             return null;
00168     }
00169 
00175     public IDecoder newDecoder() throws Exception {
00176         return newDecoder("BER");
00177     }
00178 
00185     public IDecoder newDecoder(String encodingSchema) throws Exception {
00186         if(encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("BER")) {
00187             return new BERDecoder();
00188         }
00189         else
00190         if(encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER")||encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER/Aligned")||encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER/A")) {
00191             return new PERAlignedDecoder();
00192         }        
00193         else
00194         if(encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER")||encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER/Unaligned")||encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("PER/U")) {
00195             return new PERUnalignedDecoder();
00196         }        
00197         else
00198         if(encodingSchema.equalsIgnoreCase("DER")) {
00199             return new DERDecoder();
00200         }
00201         else        
00202             return null;
00203     }
00204     
00205 }
